Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 工員
Entry.EnglishText: Factory Worker

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場・密林化
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory - Jungle

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場・密林化
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory - Jungle

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫か……？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、なんとか…… あんたら、中に行くつもりか？
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, just about... You guys aren't planning on going in there, are you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、<Tytree>という 奴を助けに……
Entry.EnglishText: We are. We need to save <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、中は毒のある バイラスでいっぱいだぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: But this place is crawling with poisonous Virus!

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスなんか 怖くないもん、ネ？
Entry.EnglishText: We're not scared of a bunch of Virus, right guys?

Entry.JapaneseText: 変な花が通路を通せんぼして 奥まで入れないぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: But how will you get through with all of those strange flowers obstructing the hallways?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクの<Yellow>炎<White>で燃やせば、 チョチョイのチョイだネ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll torch them with my fire. They won't even know what hit 'em!

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……そうだ……！ これを持っていくといい。
Entry.EnglishText: But... Ah, right! Here, you should take this.

Entry.JapaneseText: そいつを装備してれば 毒を無効化してくれる。
Entry.EnglishText: If you equip that, it'll protect you from Poison.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街の雑貨屋にも売ってるもんだが、 よかったら使ってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: You can buy more from the item shop in town. Give it a try.

Entry.JapaneseText: すまない……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>の事、頼んだぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Please rescue <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
